channel.title: Mod Fetzki: iCould
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EpaACW0iGqI
Around the 40 second mark you can see him on an account that doesn't say "Mod", implying that - that is his noob account. Also it shows RuneScape in a standalone application w/o the sword icon when downloaded from the site.
Mods can lock the topic when needed.

item.title: Mod Fetzki: iCould
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:10, topic:333216”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=429629.msg3154731#msg3154731 date=1268931889]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EpaACW0iGqI

Around the 40 second mark you can see him on an account that doesn’t say “Mod”, implying that - that is his noob account. Also it shows RuneScape in a standalone application w/o the sword icon when downloaded from the site.
[/quote]I heard you are fucking stupid for even thinking anyone in jagex staff would ever show one of their “real” accounts in a video like this.

Um i used to know a jagex mod called Mod martin…

He told me to add him on his non jagex mod account which was Martin iqbal… Think he left RS a while ago tho

I spoke to that guy once years ago while completing Underground Pass for the first time.
For the record, Jagex moderators are free to divulge the username of any non-staff accounts that they own (ie, personal accounts). But when they’re playing their personal accounts, they aren’t allowed to tell people that they’re jagex staff.[/quote]

Well what it was… I was in the giants underneith the river between edgeville and varrock… He kept stealing my kills so i called him a noob… He then spoke and i noticed the Silver crown (he was a pmod)

We got speaking… turned out he used to live 3 miles from me…

Anyhow like a couple days later i got a pm from “mod martin” and it turned out it was the guy from a few days before.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod Fetzki: iCould
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:9, topic:333216”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=429629.msg3154757#msg3154757 date=1268933609]
The client he uses is most likely a local only client or something, it’s showing the FPS etc in the top corner.
[/quote]
… It’s just Internet Explorer.[/quote]
1: Use super hacking techniques
2: Find link (also finding away around the firewall that is obviously waiting for you)
3: ???
4: Profit

Read full topic

item.title: Mod Fetzki: iCould

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:6, topic:333216”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=429629.msg3154704#msg3154704 date=1268930293]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EpaACW0iGqI

Around the 40 second mark you can see him on an account that doesn’t say “Mod”, implying that - that is his noob account. Also it shows RuneScape in a standalone application w/o the sword icon when downloaded from the site.
[/quote]I heard you are fucking stupid for even thinking anyone in jagex staff would ever show one of their “real” accounts in a video like this.

Um i used to know a jagex mod called Mod martin…

He told me to add him on his non jagex mod account which was Martin iqbal… Think he left RS a while ago tho[/quote]
I spoke to that guy once years ago while completing Underground Pass for the first time.
For the record, Jagex moderators are free to divulge the username of any non-staff accounts that they own (ie, personal accounts). But when they’re playing their personal accounts, they aren’t allowed to tell people that they’re jagex staff.

Read full topic
